name: jni-ts-template
description: Template to start with a fresh TypeScript project.

scripts.test_core: rm -rf ./dist && tsc -b && npx eslint . && LOG_SETUP=prod mocha dist/test-core/**/*.js --recursive --exit
scripts.test_all: rm -rf ./dist && tsc -b && npx eslint . && LOG_SETUP=prod mocha dist/test-core/**/*.js --recursive --exit && LOG_SETUP=prod mocha --timeout 20000 dist/test-integration/**/*.js --recursive --exit
scripts.run-container: docker container run --rm jni-ts-template "I am set in package.json"

author: jni@mopore.org
